subject: Self Care
title: What Happens When You Don't Sleep
description: A quick win: understand What Happens When You Don't Sleep.

hook.text: In 1964, Randy Gardner stayed awake for 11 days. By day four he hallucinated and couldn't think.

buildup.text: After one night without sleep, reaction time drops as much as being legally drunk on alcohol.

discovery.text: Sleep deprivation impairs judgment, memory, and emotional control. Accidents spike after bad sleep.

twist.text: The scariest part: sleep-deprived people consistently overestimate how well they are functioning.

climax.text: Chronic sleep loss is linked to heart disease, diabetes, obesity, and shortened lifespan overall.

punchline.text: Losing sleep costs more than the time you save.

quiz.question: How does one night without sleep affect reaction time?
